eixport 0.3.7
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Function to write variables in emission files

wrf_put.Rd

Extract variable

wrf_put(file = file.choose(), name = NA, POL)

Arguments

file

name of file interactively (default) or specified
name

name of the variable (any variable)
POL

input

See also

wrf_plot and wrf_get

Examples

{
# create the folder and emission file
dir.create(file.path(tempdir(), "EMISS"))
wrf_create(wrfinput_dir = system.file("extdata", package = "eixport"),
          wrfchemi_dir = file.path(tempdir(), "EMISS"))

# get the name of created file
files <- list.files(path = file.path(tempdir(), "EMISS"),
                    pattern = "wrfchemi",
                    full.names = TRUE)

# open, put some numbers and write
CO <- wrf_get(file = files[1], name = "E_CO")
CO[] = rnorm(length(CO))
wrf_put(file = files[1], name = "E_CO", POL = CO)
}
#> Warning: 'C:\Users\Schuch\AppData\Local\Temp\RtmpUfb67t\EMISS' já existe
#> 
#> NOTE: rename the output or change the default filename in namelist before run
